pattern GL_SURFACE_MAPPED_NV = 0x8700

pattern GL_SURFACE_REGISTERED_NV = 0x86FD

pattern GL_SURFACE_STATE_NV = 0x86EB

pattern GL_WRITE_DISCARD_NV = 0x88BE
